title: Transformational Listening with Guy Sengstock
description:
Guy has had some interesting conversations with John Vervaeke and Rebel Wisdom recently. You can find his youtube channel here https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuhoymQ9glku30sG4qgW-iQ

San Francisco Art Institute
Massage school in AZ
Prescott College
Impossible to not be religious
Christopher Mastropietro
Heidegger
St Maximus the Confessor
Circling
Asanas
Being deeply seen
Agapic love
Yogic practice
From hands into talking
Deep courtesy
Parents got involved in AA
Listening is transformational
Step on a different presupposition
Reading Heidegger
Presuppositions
